title: Harden Polly against prompt leakage and enforce independent thinking
author: Itachi-1824

gist.headline: Polly gets a mind of her own
gist.blurb: Our resident parrot Polly has leveled up! She's now more resistant to trickery and brings a bit more independent spirit to the conversation.
gist.summary: Updated Polly's system prompts to prevent prompt leakage vulnerabilities and encourage independent critical thinking over blind compliance.
gist.impact: Users will experience a more robust, personality-rich assistant that resists adversarial prompts and offers more thoughtful, opinionated responses.
gist.visual_concept: Polly (a pixel art parrot) looking confident and smart, perhaps wearing glasses or holding a shield/locked book, standing with the Pollinations bee. Represents the hardened security and independent thought.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee mascot chatting with a confident pixel art parrot character. The parrot is wearing tiny glasses and holding a locked book. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes. Visualizing AI security and personality. Nostalgic but beautiful.

image.prompt: Pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee wearing a tiny knight's helmet, guarding a glowing digital thought bubble. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites with warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley or A Short Hike. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
